channel.title: CVE Feed for adamskaat -- Read more By Adam
channel.description: The latest CVEs for adamskaat -- Read more By Adam

item.title: CVE-2024-9187|2024-10-15T13:23:18.501Z -- adamskaat -- read%20more%20by%20adam
item.description: The Read more By Adam plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the deleteRm() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.1.8. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to delete read more buttons.

item.title: CVE-2024-9187|2024-10-12T05:39:39.961Z -- adamskaat -- read%20more%20by%20adam
item.description: The Read more By Adam plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the deleteRm() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.1.8. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to delete read more buttons.
